resources.string: 2 Each day is a new opportunity to grow and be a better version of myself.
3 Every challenge in my life is an opportunity to learn from.
4 I have so much to be grateful for.
5 Good things are always coming into my life.
6 New opportunities await me at every turn.
I have the courage to follow my heart.
Things will unfold at precisely the right time.
